ruleToc.chapterUrl:
tag.a@href
<js>
java.put('id',result)
var option = {
         "charset": "gbk",
         "method": "get",
         "webView": true
     }; result + "," + JSON.stringify(option)
</js>
ruleToc.updateTime: html##.*file-text.*刊登時間">\\(.*?)\<.*字數">\\(\d+)字.*價格">\\(.*?)<.*##刊登时间：$1 字数： $2 价格：$3
